content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-3.5, 22.0)
Consists of:
- Boiler at position (-3.5, 22.0)
- Steam engine at position (-0.5, 17.5)
- Offshore pump (positions not specified)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the entities you are trying to connect are compatible and correctly positioned. In particular, when connecting pipes from a boiler to a steam engine, verify that there are no obstructions and that the entities are aligned properly.

### Errors when retrieving entities
- When attempting to retrieve an entity at a specific position, ensure that the entity exists at that position. Double-check the coordinates and the type of entity you are trying to access to avoid retrieval errors.
